purpleculture_pinyin:
shuō
to speak; to say; to explain; to scold; to tell off; a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心说 heliocentric theory)
говорить; сказать; объяснить; ругать; отчитаться; теория (обычно последний символ в составе, как в 日 心 说 гелиоцентрической теории)

shuì
to persuade
убеждать

heisig_chinese_memo: The horny teenager never stops speaking.  Whether it's rumors or explanations, no matter who else is there he will say something and start a chat.

shuì: (графема) уговаривать, убеждать
shuō: (графема) учение, теория, доктрина
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Sometimes the words people speak sound like they were inspired by the devil.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speaking ", from "to rede ", "to rede " also sounds, which means telling. The " said " in the table is the first text of " dui ", refer to " dui ". "Shuowen": "Speaking of explanation. From words and translations. One said: talk about it." Duan Yucai's note: "Speaking of interpretation. Saying that Shiyu Yueyi. Saying Yue, Shiyi are ancient and modern characters. Xu Shuwu The word "Yue Yi" is also the word "Yue Yi". The interpreter means to unwind, so it is joy." " Say " can be used as " Yue ." " Yue " is not found in "Shuowen", it is a different character after " Suo ". "Twenty-five Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "If you want to kill the public in order to speak in the Jin Dynasty, but not win the time." " Say " means " Yue ".

" Said " means telling such as "Yi‧Xian": "Xianqi assists cheeks and tongues, and Tengkou speaks too." Gao Heng's note: "Tengkou speaks, which means to churn the oral conversation, which is the so-called "mouths like a river"."

" Said " in ancient books is mostly used for lobbying. "Mencius: Full of Heart": "Speaking of an adult, then despise him, don't regard him as majestic."

" Say " is also used for explanation and explanation. "The Analects of Confucius-Bayi": "If something is done, don't talk about it." He Yan set an explanation and quoted Bao Xian as saying: "The matter has been done, and the explanation cannot be repeated."

" Say " can also be used for comments and comments. The Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing "Shishuo Xinyu‧ Pinzao": "At that time, the famous people talked about the characters, and the first and the last, the temperament was lost."

" Say " is also used as a noun, which means discourse or opinion or doctrine. "Shu Shun Dian": "The emperor said: "Dragon! My sage slandered and shocked our teacher."" Kong Yingdashu: "I hate people who are slanderous, and the trip of an absolute gentleman shocks us. "Guanzi Lizheng": "If you say that you win by sleeping soldiers, you will not defend yourself; if you love to win, you won't fight."

One way of interpreting ancient books can also be called " saying ." For example, "Mozi‧ Classics" has a corresponding "Mozi‧ Classics".
humanum_short_description_en: From " speaking ", from "to rede ", "to rede " also sounds, which means telling.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，從「兌」，「兌」亦聲，表示講述。表講述的「說」初文為「兌」，參「兌」。《說文》：「說釋也。从言、兌。一曰：談說。」段玉裁注：「說釋也。説釋卽悅懌。説悅，釋懌皆古今字。許書無悅懌二字也。説釋者，開解之意，故爲喜悅。」「說」可用作「悅」。「悅」不見於《說文》，為「說」之後起分化字。《左傳‧襄公二十五年》：「欲弒公以說于晉，而不獲間。」「說」即為「悅」義。

　　「說」表示講述如《易‧咸》：「咸其輔頰舌，滕口說也。」高亨注：「滕口說，謂翻騰其口談，即所謂『口若懸河』。」

　　古籍中「說」多用作遊說。《孟子‧盡心下》：「說大人，則藐之，勿視其巍巍然。」

　　 「說」也用作解釋、說明。《論語‧八佾》：「成事不說。」何晏集解引包咸曰：「事已成，不可復解說。」

　　 「說」還可用作評論、評議。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧品藻》：「時名輩共說人物，第一將盡之間，溫常失色。」

　　「說」亦作名詞，表示話語或觀點、學說。《書‧舜典》：「帝曰：『龍！朕聖讒說殄行，震驚朕師。』」孔穎達疏：「我憎疾人為讒佞之說，絕君子之行，而動驚我眾。」《管子‧立政》：「寢兵之說勝，則險阻不守；兼愛之說勝，則士卒不戰。」

　　解釋古書的一種方式也可稱為「說」。如《墨子‧經上》就有對應的《墨子‧經說上》。
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，從「兌」，「兌」亦聲，表示講述。

①用話來表達意思：說話。說明。演說。解說。
②介紹：說合(ａ．從中介紹；b．商議；c．說和。“合”均讀輕聲)。說媒。
③言論，主張：學說。著書立說。
④責備：數說。
⑤文體的一種，如韓愈的《師說》。
⑥道講談敘。

Chinese: The horny teenager never stops speaking.  Whether it's rumors or explanations, no matter who else is there he will say something and start a chat.  
Meaning: speak

從「 言 」，從「 兌 」，「 兌 」亦聲，表示講述。表講述的「 說 」初文為「 兌 」，參「 兌 」。《說文》：「說釋也。从言、兌。一曰：談說。」段玉裁注：「說釋也。説釋卽悅懌。説悅，釋懌皆古今字。許書無悅懌二字也。説釋者，開解之意，故爲喜悅。」「 說 」可用作「 悅 」。「 悅 」不見於《說文》，為「 說 」之後起分化字。《左傳‧襄公二十五年》：「欲弒公以說于晉，而不獲間。」「 說 」即為「 悅 」義。 「 說 」表示講述如《易‧咸》：「咸其輔頰舌，滕口說也。」高亨注：「滕口說，謂翻騰其口談，即所謂『口若懸河』。」 古籍中「 說 」多用作遊說。《孟子‧盡心下》：「說大人，則藐之，勿視其巍巍然。」 「 說 」也用作解釋、說明。《論語‧八佾》：「成事不說。」何晏集解引包咸曰：「事已成，不可復解說。」 「 說 」還可用作評論、評議。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧品藻》：「時名輩共說人物，第一將盡之間，溫常失色。」 「 說 」亦作名詞，表示話語或觀點、學說。《書‧舜典》：「帝曰：『龍！朕聖讒說殄行，震驚朕師。』」孔穎達疏：「我憎疾人為讒佞之說，絕君子之行，而動驚我眾。」《管子‧立政》：「寢兵之說勝，則險阻不守；兼愛之說勝，則士卒不戰。」 解釋古書的一種方式也可稱為「 說 」。如《墨子‧經上》就有對應的《墨子‧經說上》。
